content:
Craft an item of type: granite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a granite wall, I need to place 6 granite blocks in the crafting grid in the shape of a square. Therefore I will move the first granite block from slot 17 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
